page.title: 15GUITING POWER.THE GARAGE
page.content: The garage-owner likes his job as it is an outdoor job,and this is a beautiful area.He opens from 7a.m.- 7p.m.,weekends 8a.m.-1p.m. 8000 cars per year buy petrol. He sells about 45000 gallons annually and 10000 gallons of diesel. The owner's grandfather started the business in 1920 as a carrier plying between Guiting Power and Cheltenham. He sells about 15 gas cylinders weekly.They come from Stonehouse,while petrol comes from Gloucester docks.It costs 2.04 per gallon. He services 350 cars annually and spares come from Cheltenham.There are two taxis which are used as school buses. The shop sells spark plugs,oil filters,bulbs,anti-freeze,batteries etc.There is a machine for removing car-engines and one for tyres.
